prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a strong shell and powerful cannons on its back.
I want a Pokemon that has a large, turtle-like appearance and can shoot powerful jets of water.
Generate a creature resembling a tortoise with blue and gray colors, showcasing its aquatic nature.
Make a Pokemon that looks intimidating yet friendly, with a shell adorned in spikes and cannons.
Imagine a powerful Pokemon that thrives in water, featuring sturdy limbs and a massive body.
Design a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, with a unique blend of blue and gray shades.
Show me a Pokemon that represents the ultimate evolution of a water-type starter, featuring a robust build.
